Class ConnectTag

java.lang.Object

      com.intersys.jsp.ConnectTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IterationTag, JspTag, Tag
public class ConnectTag
extends TagSupport

Establishes connection to database. No HTML elements are created.

Version:
1.0

Michael A Bouzinier
